mapper.select: select A.* ,B.* ,C.name , D.* , E.test_state from (tb_lec A , tb_app_list B , tb_userinfo C , tb_test D) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_test_submit E ON D.test_cd = E.test_cd AND E.loginID = B.loginID where 1=1 and A.lec_cd = B.lec_cd and A.loginID = C.loginID and A.lec_cd = D.lec_cd and B.loginID = #{loginId} and B.app_yn='Y' and B.end_yn='N';
select lec_cd , loginID , score , test_state , test_sm_date , test_cd from tb_test_submit where lec_cd = #{lec_cd} and loginID = #{loginID} and test_cd = #{test_cd};

select A.sm_ans, A.cor_yn, A.score, B.test_que_cd, B.test_que_ctt, B.test_opt_1, B.test_opt_2, B.test_opt_3, B.test_opt_4, B.test_cor_ans from (select sm_ans, cor_yn, score, test_que_cd from tb_sm_ans where lec_cd = #{lec_cd} and loginID = #{loginID} and test_cd = #{test_cd}) as A inner join tb_test_bank as B on (A.test_que_cd = B.test_que_cd);
